item.description: About Me I am a Ph.D. candidate in the Computer Science Department (DCC) at Federal University of Minas Gerais (UFMG), Brazil. Before that I received my M.Sc. at the same institution. And before that I received my B.Sc. in Computer Science from Federal University of Uberl√¢ndia (UFU), Brazil. Broadly, I am interested in research problems concerning systems’ performance, specially large-scale distributed systems. Recently, I have been working on performance diagnosis and reconfiguration of data parallel programming models (a.
